sait.frs.manager

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.frs.manager.Manager

  • public final class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for managing flights, reservations, and airports.

      • findFlightByCode

        public Flight findFlightByCode(java.lang.String flightCode)
        Finds a flight using code.
        Parameters:
        flightCode - Flight code.
        Returns:
        Flight object or null if code is not found.

      • makeReservation

        public Reservation makeReservation(Flight flight,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String citizenship)
                            throws NullFlightException,
                                   NoMoreSeatsException,
                                   InvalidNameException,
                                   InvalidCitizenshipException
        Makes a reservation.
        Parameters:
        flight - Flight to book reservation for.
        name - Name of person (cannot be null or empty).
        citizenship - Citizenship of person (cannot be null or empty).
        Returns:
        Created reservation instance.
        Throws:
        NullFlightException - Thrown if flight is null.
        NoMoreSeatsException - Thrown if flight is booked up.
        InvalidNameException - Thrown if name is null or empty.
        InvalidCitizenshipException - Thrown if citizenship is null or empty.

      • findFlights

        public java.util.ArrayList<Flight> findFlights(java.lang.String from,
                                               java.lang.String to,
                                               java.lang.String weekday)
        Finds flights going between airports on a specified weekday.
        Parameters:
        from - From airport
        to - To airport
        weekday - Day of week (one of WEEKDAY_* constants). Use WEEKDAY_ANY for any day of the week.
        Returns:
        Any found Flight objects.

      • findReservations

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> findReservations(java.lang.String reservationCode,
                                                         java.lang.String airline,
                                                         java.lang.String name)
        Finds reservations containing either reservation code or airline.
        Parameters:
        reservationCode - Reservation code to search for.
        airline - Airline to search for.
        name - Travelers name to search for.
        Returns:
        Any matching Reservation objects.

      • findReservationByCode

        public Reservation findReservationByCode(java.lang.String reservationCode)
        Finds reservation with the exact reservation code.
        Parameters:
        reservationCode - Reservation code.
        Returns:
        Reservation object or null if none found.
